# textInputPlaceholder

**Instance Property**

The placeholder text that the system localizes and displays in the text input field.

## Declaration

```swift
var textInputPlaceholder: String { get }
```

## Getting Information

- **textInputButtonTitle**: The localized title of the text input button that the system displays to the user.
